data.message: Phase 1A: Text Representation & Queue - Duro Enhancement Implementation: Successfully implemented: 1) embeddings.py with locked-down artifact_to_text() spec - defines exactly what gets embedded for each type (facts: claim+snippet+tags, episodes: goal+result_summary only - NO actions), 2) embedding_worker.py with file-based async queue (pending_embeddings/ directory) for crash-resilient processing, 3) ranking_config.py with explicit tunable weights (vector=0.6, bm25=0.4, recency_boost, type_weights, confidence_boost), 4) Integrated queue with ArtifactStore - artifacts are queued for embedding after save, 5) Health check reports queue depth. All tests pass.
data.task: Phase 1A: Text Representation & Queue - Duro Enhancement Implementation
data.outcome: Successfully implemented: 1) embeddings.py with locked-down artifact_to_text() spec - defines exactly what gets embedded for each type (facts: claim+snippet+tags, episodes: goal+result_summary only - NO actions), 2) embedding_worker.py with file-based async queue (pending_embeddings/ directory) for crash-resilient processing, 3) ranking_config.py with explicit tunable weights (vector=0.6, bm25=0.4, recency_boost, type_weights, confidence_boost), 4) Integrated queue with ArtifactStore - artifacts are queued for embedding after save, 5) Health check reports queue depth. All tests pass.
